thread.title: Watch: CV senior and fellow students get in the school spirit with a lip dub
thread.title_full: Watch: CV senior and fellow students get in the school spirit with a lip dub

author: CLAUDIA ESBENSHADE | Community Engagement Specialist
title: Watch: CV senior and fellow students get in the school spirit with a lip dub
text:
Comments Esbenshade, Claudia 
Conestoga Valley High School senior Ben Cutler finished out the school's homecoming week activities on Friday by releasing a lip dub to Walk the Moon's "Shut Up and Dance." 
Filmed in one continuous take throughout the hallways of the school, the video was done with two practice runs and included the entire junior and senior classes, teachers and other students, according to the district's spokesperson Adam Aurand. 
Cutler, who planned the video as a part of a class project, spotlighted students from many of the school's clubs, sports and extracurricular activities in the video. The ending shot in the video was not part of the continuous take, but was filmed during a school pep rally on Friday. 
Middle school can be rough. A new student may find himself dropped off in front of a menacinâ€¦ More Headlines
